trans-unit.source: Provides validation of an <xref:System.Int64> value.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la convalida di un <xref:System.Int64>valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The LongValidator is used to ensure a `long` (a 64-bit signed integer) meets specific criteria.
trans-unit.target: Il LongValidator viene utilizzato per garantire un `long` (intero con segno a 64 bit) a criteri specifici.

trans-unit.source: The criteria for validation is established when an instance of the LongValidator class is created.
trans-unit.target: I criteri di convalida viene stabilita quando viene creata un'istanza della classe LongValidator.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%29> constructor ensures that the `long` value that is being validated adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%29>costruttore assicura che il `long` valore da convalidare rispetti massimo e minimo.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor checks both the minimum and maximum <xref:System.Int64> values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29>costruttore controlla minimo e massimo <xref:System.Int64>valori, nonché indica se l'intervallo di convalida è esclusivo.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Int64%29> constructor checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the <xref:System.Int64> value is equal to a specific resolution value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Int64%29>costruttore controlla i tre parametri precedenti e controlla inoltre se il <xref:System.Int64>valore è uguale a un valore di risoluzione specifico.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Int64%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.CanValidate%2A>metodo determina se il tipo di oggetto da convalidare corrisponde al tipo previsto.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.CanValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto da convalidare viene passato come parametro del <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.Validate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The LongValidator constructor ensures that the long value being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore LongValidator garantisce che il valore di tipo long in corso la verifica è conforme al massimo e minimo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the minimum length of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica la lunghezza minima del <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the maximum length of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica la lunghezza massima del <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When the LongValidator constructor is used, it checks both the minimum and maximum <xref:System.Int64> values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene utilizzato il costruttore LongValidator, controlla minimo e massimo <xref:System.Int64>valori, nonché indica se l'intervallo di convalida è esclusivo.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Int64> value must not be between `minValue` and `maxValue`.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `rangeIsExclusive` parametro è impostato su `true`, <xref:System.Int64>non deve essere compreso tra `minValue` e `maxValue`.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the minimum length of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica la lunghezza minima del <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the maximum length of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica la lunghezza massima del <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>valore che specifica se l'intervallo di convalida è esclusivo.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Configuration.LongValidator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you specify the `resolution`, the <xref:System.Int64> value being validated must be equal to that value in order to pass validation.
trans-unit.target: Quando si specifica il `resolution`, <xref:System.Int64>valore da convalidare deve essere uguale al valore per passare la convalida.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the minimum length of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica la lunghezza minima del <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies the maximum length of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica la lunghezza massima del <xref uid="langword_csharp_long" name="long" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the validation range is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>valore che specifica se l'intervallo di convalida è esclusivo.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> value that specifies a specific value that must be matched.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int64>valore che specifica un valore specifico che deve corrispondere.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the type of the object can be validated.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il tipo dell'oggetto può essere convalidato.

trans-unit.source: The type of object.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di oggetto.

trans-unit.source: if the type parameter matches an value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se il type parametro corrisponde a un valore; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il valore di un oggetto è valido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator> class contains the rules necessary to validate an <xref:System.Int64> object.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator>classe contiene le regole necessarie per convalidare un <xref:System.Int64>oggetto.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator>

trans-unit.source: The rules are established when an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Le regole vengono definite quando un'istanza di <xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator>classe viene creata.</xref:System.Configuration.LongValidator>

trans-unit.source: The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da convalidare viene passato come parametro del metodo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: The value of an object.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di un oggetto.
